parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden loss of acceleration can lead to accidents, especially when driving on highways or in heavy traffic, as the vehicle may stall or lose power, causing the driver to lose control.
symptoms: The vehicle hesitates or chugs when accelerating
the wrench light on the dashboard illuminates
the vehicle shakes or vibrates
loss of power or acceleration
inability to shift gears.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the throttle body can cause the vehicle to lose power or acceleration, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle hesitates or chugs when accelerating
the wrench light on the dashboard illuminates
loss of power or acceleration
inability to shift gears.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission slipping and lurching can cause the vehicle to lose control, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The vehicle lurches forward even when applying the brake
the transmission slips in drive
the vehicle lurches forward when moving from park or reverse to drive.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electronic stability control system can cause the vehicle to lose control, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The vehicle's electronic stability control system is defective
the vehicle makes a squealing noise upon acceleration from a full stop.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electric power steering can cause the steering wheel to become stiff or difficult to turn, leading to loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The steering wheel becomes stiff or difficult to turn
the steering wheel twitches or jerks
the power steering fails to operate
the steering wheel locks and does not allow movement
the vehicle is difficult to control or maneuver.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering torque sensor can cause the electric power steering to fail, leading to loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The power steering fails to operate
the steering wheel becomes stiff or difficult to turn
the steering wheel twitches or jerks
the vehicle is difficult to control or maneuver.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the timing chain cover can cause the serpentine belt tensioner to detach, leading to the loss of all loads driven by the serpentine belt, including the alternator and power steering. This can cause the vehicle to become difficult to control or maneuver, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The serpentine belt tensioner detaches
the power steering fails to operate
the alternator fails to generate electricity
the battery drains
the vehicle is difficult to control or maneuver.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the throttle body can cause the vehicle to lose power and acceleration, leading to loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle loses power and acceleration
the wrench light comes on
the vehicle convulses or jerks abruptly
the vehicle is difficult to control or maneuver.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the throttle can cause the engine to stall, leading to a loss of vehicle control, which can increase the risk of accidents, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: The engine stalls while driving
the vehicle is unable to maintain speed
the check engine warning indicator illuminates
the fuel cap warning indicator illuminates.
